src:
Ingin Jadi Lebih Baik, Bennacer Kini Belajar dari Andrea Pirlo
07 Nov 2019, 21:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang AC Milan Ismael Bennacer berusaha untuk meningkatkan performanya di atas lapangan dengan mempelajari permainan legenda Rossoneri, Andrea Pirlo.
Bennacer awalnya adalah gelandang yang beroperasi lebih menyerang. Akan tetapi ia sekarang bermain lebih ke belakang.
Pemain asal Aljazair ini diposisikan tepat di depan lini pertahanan. Dari posisi ini ia diharap bisa mengontrol permainan rekan-rekannya dan membawa timnya meraih kemenangan.
Ia tampil apik selama membela Empoli dan juga Timnas Aljazair. Akan tetapi, pemain berusia 21 tahun itu belum bisa menunjukkan performa terbaiknya bersama dengan AC Milan.
text:
Wanting to Be Better, Bennacer Now Learns from Andrea Pirlo
Nov 7 2019, 21:19 by Bola.net
AC Milan midfielder Ismael Bennacer is trying to improve his performance on the pitch by learning the Rossoneri legend Andrea Pirlo.
Bennacer was originally a midfielder who operated more attacking. However, he is now playing more backward.
The Algerian is positioned right in front of the defense. From this position he is expected to control the game of his colleagues and bring his team to victory.
He performed neatly while defending Empoli and the Algerian national team. However, the 21-year-old has not been able to show his best performance along with AC Milan.
